channel.title: ble on 小夫子的随笔

item.title: 蓝牙官网生成蓝牙服务的uuid
item.description: 蓝牙如何申请厂商UUID 参考论坛： https://devzone.nordicsemi.com/f/nordic-q-a/7260/how-to-acquire-a-vendor-base-uuid/25668#25668 建议用此处工具生成UUID 不需要注册和付费 Bluetooth SIG recommends you to just use the tool found here to generate your UUID. It is extremely unlikely that you will generate a UUID that collides with some other company, so you are not required to register or pay for it. I am not not even sure the SIG even gives you the option to register it at the moment. 生成UUID的国际组织： https://www.itu.int/en/ITU-T/asn1/Pages/UUID/uuids.aspx 生成UUID的界面： https://www.itu.int/en/ITU-T/asn1/Pages/UUID/generate_uuid.aspx
